structure:Codelist.common:Name: Greek Economic Sector Classification
structure:Codelist.common:Description: Comprehensive classification of economic sectors following NACE (Nomenclature statistique des activités économiques dans la Communauté européenne) standards and broad sector groupings for labor force statistics.

structure:Code.common:Name: Not applicable
structure:Code.common:Description: Not applicable to the data or special processing code.

structure:Code.common:Name: Total employed
structure:Code.common:Description: Total for all employed persons across all sectors.

structure:Code.common:Name: Primary sector
structure:Code.common:Description: Primary economic activities including agriculture, forestry, fishing, and mining.

structure:Code.common:Name: Secondary sector
structure:Code.common:Description: Secondary economic activities including manufacturing, construction, and utilities.

structure:Code.common:Name: Tertiary sector
structure:Code.common:Description: Tertiary economic activities including services, trade, and public administration.

structure:Code.common:Name: NACE-68: Agriculture, Forestry, Hunting and Fishing
structure:Code.common:Description: Agricultural, forestry, hunting and fishing activities according to NACE-68 classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: NACE-68: Mining and Quarrying
structure:Code.common:Description: Mining and quarrying activities according to NACE-68 classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: NACE-68: Manufacturing
structure:Code.common:Description: Manufacturing activities according to NACE-68 classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: NACE-68: Electricity, Gas, Steam and Water
structure:Code.common:Description: Electricity, gas, steam and water supply activities according to NACE-68 classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: NACE-68: Construction
structure:Code.common:Description: Construction activities according to NACE-68 classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: NACE-68: Wholesale and Retail Trade and Restaurants and Hotels
structure:Code.common:Description: Wholesale and retail trade, restaurants and hotels according to NACE-68 classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: NACE-68: Transport, Storage and Communication
structure:Code.common:Description: Transport, storage and communication activities according to NACE-68 classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: NACE-68: Financing, Insurance, Real Estate and Business Services
structure:Code.common:Description: Financing, insurance, real estate and business services according to NACE-68 classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: NACE-68: Services
structure:Code.common:Description: General services activities according to NACE-68 classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: NACE-68: Activities not adequately described
structure:Code.common:Description: Activities not adequately described according to NACE-68 classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: NACE rev2: Agriculture, forestry and fishing
structure:Code.common:Description: Agriculture, forestry and fishing activities according to NACE rev2 classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: NACE rev2: Mining and quarrying
structure:Code.common:Description: Mining and quarrying activities according to NACE rev2 classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: NACE rev2: Manufacturing
structure:Code.common:Description: Manufacturing activities according to NACE rev2 classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: NACE rev2: Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply
structure:Code.common:Description: Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply activities according to NACE rev2 classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: NACE rev2: Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities
structure:Code.common:Description: Water supply, sewerage, waste management and remediation activities according to NACE rev2 classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: NACE rev2: Construction
structure:Code.common:Description: Construction activities according to NACE rev2 classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: NACE rev2: Wholesale and retail trade; repair of motor vehicles and motorcycles
structure:Code.common:Description: Wholesale and retail trade, repair of motor vehicles and motorcycles according to NACE rev2 classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: NACE rev2: Accommodation and food service activities
structure:Code.common:Description: Accommodation and food service activities according to NACE rev2 classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: NACE rev2: Transportation and storage
structure:Code.common:Description: Transportation and storage activities according to NACE rev2 classification.

structure:Code.common:Description: Information and communication activities according to NACE rev2 classification.

structure:Code.common:Description: Financial and insurance activities according to NACE rev2 classification.

structure:Code.common:Description: Real estate activities according to NACE rev2 classification.

structure:Code.common:Description: Professional, scientific and technical activities according to NACE rev2 classification.

structure:Code.common:Description: Administrative and support service activities according to NACE rev2 classification.

structure:Code.common:Description: Public administration and defence, compulsory social security according to NACE rev2 classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: NACE rev2: Education
structure:Code.common:Description: Education activities according to NACE rev2 classification.

structure:Code.common:Description: Human health and social work activities according to NACE rev2 classification.

structure:Code.common:Description: Arts, entertainment and recreation activities according to NACE rev2 classification.

structure:Code.common:Description: Other service activities according to NACE rev2 classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: NACE rev2: Activities of households as employers; undifferentiated goods- and services-producing activities of households
structure:Code.common:Description: Activities of households as employers, undifferentiated goods- and services-producing activities of households according to NACE rev2 classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: NACE rev2: Activities of extraterritorial organisations and bodies
structure:Code.common:Description: Activities of extraterritorial organisations and bodies according to NACE rev2 classification.

structure:Code.common:Name: NACE rev2: Did not answer
structure:Code.common:Description: Respondents who did not answer the sector question according to NACE rev2 classification.
